meaningMnemonic: You use your <radical>fingers</radical> when you're in <radical>private</radical> to use an <radical>arrow</radical> to <kanji>push open</kanji> things.
readingMnemonic: Your favorite thing to <kanji>push open</kanji> is your own <reading>eye</reading> (あい). You take the arrow into your fingers and gently push each lid open until you can see.
